WorkItem.Description:
Hello together,

would like to modify a existing DWORD Value. But isn't possible to change Value Type in GUI.
See attached Screenshot.

Is this a bug - or a layer 8 Problem ? 

Thank you for your Reply ;).

Greetings
Wolfgang
WorkItem.Summary: Custum Update Creator - Modify Registry Value other than REG_SZ not possible?

Comments.Message:
Hi, you don't need to specify that the Reg Value is of type of DWORD as the Reg Value already exists.
WPP will not use the content of the field «Value Type», as he don't need it.
In addition, you have to put the name of the Reg Value in the field «Value» instead of the old Data.
